abstract: Pres Obama, following meeting with national security officials at CIA headquarters, says United States has made significant progress in fighting Islamic State group; states forces of group are at lowest level in two years.
snippet: After meeting with national security officials, the president said an American-led effort had reduced Islamic State forces to the lowest level in two years....

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: After meeting with national security officials, the president said an American-led effort had reduced Islamic State forces to the lowest level in two years.

headline.main: Obama Reports Gains, and ‘Momentum,’ Against ISIS
headline.print_headline: Gains Made in Struggle Against ISIS, Obama Says
